001package edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.model;
002
003import edu.cnm.deepdive.tetris.model.Block.ShapeType;
004import java.util.ArrayList;
005import java.util.Collections;
006import java.util.LinkedList;
007import java.util.List;
008import java.util.Queue;
009import java.util.Random;
010
011public class Dealer {
012
013  private final Queue<ShapeType> queue;
014  private final List<ShapeType> bag;
015  private final int size;
016  private final Random rng;
017
018  public Dealer(int size, Random rng) {
019    this.size = size;
020    this.rng = rng;
021    queue = new LinkedList<>();
022    bag = new ArrayList<>();
023    while (queue.size() < size) {
024      transfer();
025    }
026  }
027
028  public ShapeType next() {
029    ShapeType shape = queue.remove();
030    transfer();
031    return shape;
032  }
033
034  public List<ShapeType> getQueue() {
035    return Collections.unmodifiableList((LinkedList<ShapeType>) queue);
036  }
037
038  public int getSize() {
039    return size;
040  }
041
042  private void transfer() {
043    if (bag.isEmpty()) {
044      Collections.addAll(bag, ShapeType.values());
045      Collections.shuffle(bag, rng);
046    }
047    ShapeType shape = bag.remove(0);
048    queue.add(shape);
049  }
050
051}
